item.title: 美国上诉法院推翻证交会对私募股权和对冲基金的监督规定
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院驳回了美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）旨在为投资者提供更多私募基金透明度的规定，但这个近 27 万亿美元的行业表示，该规定有可能从根本上改变其经营方式。【原文：A U.S. appeals court rejected a Securities and Exchange Commission rule intended to give investors more transparency into private funds, but which the nearly $27 trillion industry said threatened to fundamentally change how it does business.】

item.title: 特斯拉投资者罗恩-巴伦支持马斯克 560 亿美元的薪酬计划
item.description: 著名投资人罗恩-巴伦（Ron Baron）周二发表公开信，支持特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）560亿美元的薪酬方案，该方案将于下周接受股东投票。【原文：Prominent investor Ron Baron has come out in support of Tesla CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package, which is up for a shareholder vote next week, according to an open letter from the Baron Capital founder on Tuesday.】

item.title: 杰克丹尼尔制造商布朗-福尔曼（Brown-Forman）因提价而实现超预期季度利润
item.description: 杰克丹尼尔威士忌制造商布朗-福尔曼（Brown-Forman）周三公布的第四季度利润超出预期，原因是其高端威士忌和龙舌兰酒的提价帮助抵消了需求的减弱，这使得该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨了 3%。【原文：Jack Daniel's maker Brown-Forman beat fourth-quarter profit expectations on Wednesday, as price hikes on its premium whiskey and tequila helped offset waning demand, sending the company's shares up 3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: ASML 因首席财务官达森对订单的评论而股价上涨
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）的一份分析报告援引首席财务官罗杰-达森（Roger Dassen）的评论称，他对未来几个季度顶级客户台积电（TSMC）可能获得订单持积极态度，此后 ASML 股价周三上涨。【原文：ASML shares rose on Wednesday after a Jefferies analyst report cited comments from CFO Roger Dassen which suggested he was positive about the possibility of orders coming through from top customer TSMC in the coming quarters.】

item.title: 沃尔玛首次向美国商店小时工发放奖金
item.description: 沃尔玛周三表示，将有史以来第一次向其美国门店的小时工（包括药店和视觉中心门店的小时工）发放奖金，此举可能会提高 70 万一线员工的工资。【原文：Walmart will, for the first time ever, pay bonuses to its U.S. hourly store workers, including those at its pharmacy and Vision Center stores, the retailer said on Wednesday, in a move that could boost wages for 700,000 front-line staff.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧洲央行将批准希腊银行在 16 年后恢复支付股息的请求
item.description: 四位银行家周三告诉路透社，欧洲中央银行有望批准希腊银行在 16 年后恢复支付股息的请求，这是希腊银行业反弹的又一迹象。【原文：The European Central Bank is expected to approve a request by Greek banks to resume the payment of dividends after 16 years, four bankers told Reuters on Wednesday, a further sign of the sector's rebound.】

item.title: 路透社调查发现，美联储今年将从 9 月开始降息两次；但仍有一次或零次降息的风险
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，大多数预测者认为，美国联邦储备委员会将在 9 月份下调其关键利率，并在今年再下调一次。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve will cut its key interest rate in September and once more this year, according to a majority of forecasters in a Reuters poll that also showed a significant risk they opt for only one or none at all.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，NBA 接近达成价值 760 亿美元的电视转播协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国国家篮球协会即将与 NBC、迪士尼旗下的 ESPN 和亚马逊敲定单独的交易，这将在 11 年内带来约 760 亿美元的媒体收入。【原文：The National Basketball Association is close to finalizing separate deals with NBC, Disney's ESPN and Amazon that would bring in about $76 billion in media revenue over 11 years, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国 5 月私营部门薪资增幅低于预期 - ADP
item.description: 周三的一份报告显示，5月份美国私营企业薪资增幅低于预期，而上个月的数据被下调。【原文：U.S. private payrolls increased less than expected in May while data for the prior month was revised lower, a report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 惠普企业因人工智能服务器需求强劲而业绩大增
item.description: 惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise）在盘前交易中上涨约 14%，此前该公司预计第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，这主要得益于市场对其人工智能优化服务器的需求不断增长。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise rose about 14% in premarket trading after the company forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates, helped by growing demand for its AI-optimized servers.】

item.title: Trafigura 与鲁本兄弟公司就 840 万美元的诉讼达成和解
item.description: 大宗商品贸易商 Trafigura 周三表示，已就一家由地产和金属大亨鲁本兄弟拥有的公司提起的诉讼达成和解，此案与正在进行的涉嫌镍欺诈案有关。【原文：Commodity trader Trafigura has settled a lawsuit filed by a firm owned by property and metals tycoons the Reuben brothers, Trafigura said on Wednesday, in a case linked to an ongoing alleged nickel fraud case.】

item.title: HanesBrands 将以 12 亿美元的价格向 Authentic Brands 出售运动服装业务 Champion
item.description: HanesBrands 周三表示，将把旗下运动服装业务 Champion 出售给 Authentic Brands Group，交易价值为 12 亿美元。【原文：HanesBrands said on Wednesday it would sell its sportswear business Champion to Authentic Brands Group in a deal valued at $1.2 billion.】

item.title: 大选扰动市场，2024 年最大规模竞选迫在眉睫
item.description: 墨西哥、南非和印度的选举结果使货币和股票都受到了冲击，这清楚地提醒我们，在占全球经济产出 60% 以上的国家和一半以上的人口将参加投票的这一年里，政治对市场仍然很重要。【原文：Election results in Mexico, South Africa and India jolted currencies and stocks alike, a stark reminder that politics still matter for markets in a year when countries accounting for more than 60% of global economic output and more than half its population will vote.】

item.title: Alphabet 任命礼来资深人士阿什肯纳齐为首席财务官
item.description: Alphabet 任命阿纳特-阿什肯纳兹（Anat Ashkenazi）为首席财务官，让这位在礼来公司工作了二十年的资深人士在人工智能时代负责谷歌母公司的财务工作。【原文：Alphabet named Anat Ashkenazi as its chief financial officer, putting the two-decade veteran of Eli Lilly in charge of finances of the Google parent in the artificial intelligence era.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国中信将里昂证券离岸银行家的基本工资最多削减 30
item.description: 两名知情人士称，由于交易量下降，以及面临缩小与在岸业务薪酬差距的压力，中国中信证券正在削减其离岸平台里昂证券（CLSA）100多名银行家的基本工资。【原文：China's CITIC Securities is cutting the base salary of more than 100 bankers at its offshore platform CLSA amid a drop in deal making and pressure to narrow the pay gap with its onshore operations, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 需求复苏，金宝汤上调年度净销售额预期
item.description: 金宝汤公司（Campbell Soup）周三上调了对年度净销售额增长的预期，原因是其即食汤和餐食需求的复苏，以及对饶氏酱料生产商索沃斯品牌公司（Sovos Brands）的收购。【原文：Campbell Soup on Wednesday raised its forecast for annual net sales growth, banking on a recovery in demand for its ready-to-eat soups and meals and from its acquisition of Rao's sauce maker Sovos Brands.】

item.title: 精神航空首席财务官下台
item.description: Spirit AeroSystems 公司周三表示，马克-苏钦斯基（Mark Suchinski）将辞去这家航空航天供应商的首席财务官职务。【原文：Spirit AeroSystems on Wednesday said Mark Suchinski is stepping down as Chief Financial Officer of the aerospace supplier.】

item.title: 证券交易所被要求改进处理故障的方式
item.description: 全球证券监察机构国际证监会组织（IOSCO）周三表示，证券交易所和其他交易平台应制定并公布处理故障的计划，为客户提供更高的可预测性。【原文：Stock exchanges and other trading platforms should draw up and make public plans for dealing with outages to provide greater predictability for customers, global securities watchdog IOSCO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 华尔街期货因降息押注而上扬
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货走高，原因是在一系列经济数据显示经济增长放缓后，投资者加强了对美联储今年提前开始降息的押注。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Wednesday as investors strengthened bets on an earlier start to rate cuts by the Federal Reserve this year than previously expected, after a string of economic data pointed to slowing economic growth.】

item.title: 迪尔宣布裁员应对农机需求放缓
item.description: 迪尔公司（Deere & Co）周三表示，为应对农用设备需求的下滑，该公司将裁减数量不详的生产和受薪岗位。【原文：Deere & Co said on Wednesday it would cut an unspecified number of production and salaried jobs to tackle a downturn in farm equipment demand.】

item.title: 自 2021 年 GameStop 狂潮以来，美国证券交易委员会（SEC）是如何促进美国市场发展的？
item.description: 继 2021 年 "meme 股票 "事件之后，旨在提高市场弹性和透明度的重大改革引发了 GameStop 零售交易的最新复苏。【原文：The latest resurgence of retail trading in GameStop follows major changes aimed at boosting the resilience and transparency of the market following the 2021 "meme stock" saga.】

item.title: 美洲 跌势买盘持续，加拿大将放宽政策
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 波音公司将再次尝试发射首次 "星际客机 "载人飞行任务
item.description: 波音公司的 "星际客机"（Starliner）宇宙飞船将于本周三进行第三次尝试，首次将宇航员送入太空，这是该航空巨头踌躇满志要加强与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）竞争的一个拖延已久的测试里程碑。【原文：Boeing's Starliner spacecraft is set for a third attempt to fly astronauts to space for the first time on Wednesday, a much-delayed testing milestone in the aerospace giant's ambitions to step up its competition with Elon Musk's SpaceX.】

item.title: 洞察力：美国顶级新闻应用源自中国，借助人工智能 "写小说
item.description: 去年平安夜，一款扎根于中国的免费应用程序 NewsBreak（美国下载量最大的新闻应用程序）发表了一篇关于小镇枪击案的文章，令人震惊。标题是 "圣诞节悲剧袭击新泽西州布里奇顿，小镇枪支暴力事件不断上升"。【原文：Last Christmas Eve, NewsBreak, a free app with roots in China that is the most downloaded news app in the United States, published an alarming piece about a small town shooting. It was headlined "Christmas Day Tragedy Strikes Bridgeton, New Jersey Amid Rising Gun Violence in Small Towns."】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Dollar Tree 将探索出售 Family Dollar
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，Dollar Tree 计划探索包括出售或分拆 Family Dollar 在内的各种选择。【原文：Dollar Tree plans to explore options including a potential sale or spinoff of Family Dollar, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国 5 月出口快速增长，提振经济增长前景
item.description: 得益于海外需求的改善，中国 5 月份的出口可能连续第二个月快速增长，这让中国政府官员在应对国内众多挑战以支撑不平衡的经济复苏时感到些许安慰。【原文：China's exports likely grew more quickly and for a second month in May thanks to improving overseas demand, giving officials some comfort as they navigate numerous challenges at home to shore up an uneven economic recovery.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国交易所酝酿不向量化基金提供 "某些 "数据
item.description: 两位消息人士称，上海和深圳证券交易所正在考虑暂停向计算机驱动的量化基金等机构提供某些增值市场数据，这是中国监管机构为加强对这一被指责助长市场波动的行业的审查而做出的努力。【原文：The Shanghai and Shenzhen stock exchanges are considering suspending certain value-added market data feeds to institutions such as computer-driven quant funds, two sources said in an effort by Chinese regulators to tighten scrutiny of a sector blamed for contributing to market volatility.】

item.title: 不再有巨无霸鸡肉 - 欧盟法院裁定麦当劳在商标案中败诉
item.description: 欧洲第二最高法院周三表示，美国快餐连锁店麦当劳无权将 "巨无霸 "一词用于家禽产品，因为麦当劳已连续五年未将该词用于家禽产品，爱尔兰竞争对手 Supermac's 在一场旷日持久的商标纠纷中取得了部分胜利。【原文：U.S. fast-food chain McDonald's does not have the right to use the term "Big Mac" for poultry products after it had not used it for them for five consecutive years, Europe's second top court said on Wednesday, in a partial win for Irish rival Supermac's in a long-running trademark dispute.】

item.title: 采购经理人指数显示欧元区商业活动以一年来最快速度扩张
item.description: 一项私人调查显示，欧元区 5 月份的商业活动以一年来最快的速度增长，原因是该集团占主导地位的服务业的增长速度超过了制造业的萎缩速度。【原文：Euro zone business activity expanded at its quickest rate in a year in May as growth in the bloc's dominant services industry outpaced contraction in manufacturing, according to a private survey, which also showed price pressures easing.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司五月份销量增长 13
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周三表示，该公司 5 月份的销量比去年同期增长 13%，达到 68,034 辆，主要原因是欧洲市场的销量增长了 31%，其全电动车型 EX30 的强劲表现也起到了推动作用。【原文：Volvo Cars' sales rose 13% in May from a year earlier to 68,034 cars, driven mainly by a 31% jump in Europe and helped by strong performance for its fully electric model EX30, the group said on Wednesday.】
